CustomField.description: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that has already been recognized within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the % Complete recognition method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: In the corporate currency, the amount of revenue that has already been recognized within the relevant time period for the Milestone revenue source, when using the % Complete recognition method.
CustomField.label: Corp: % Complete: Milestone: Recognized
